price: (22) [Saying], "Go early to your crop if you would cut the fruit."
arabic: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: ani igh'dū ʿalā ḥarthikum in kuntum ṣārimīna
